content: the magic custom-fit raglan is my take on pamela costello s incredible custom-fit raglan with her permission i ve updated the form included some graphics and added some tips on how to further embellish/customize your sweater this worksheet will allow you to design and create a custom-fitted unique top pullover/cardigan/tee/jacket using whatever yarn you have on hand the gauge you prefer and the sizing you need you can use stitch patterns that appeal to you including cables or lacework and your hems can be whatever you want them to be so many options
